amendment.description: To provide for the calculation of coastal impact assistance payments based on previous years' revenues.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1397 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1397 proposed by Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S9942-9943; text: CR S9942) To provide for the calculation of coastal impact assistance payments based on previous years' revenues.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1397 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1397 proposed by Senator Domenici.
